snippet: The JX35 misses most of its marks. Its bland performance makes the Acura MDX and Lexus RX feel like sport sedans by comparison. And its undisciplined design is a riot of swoops and lines that go everywhere and nowhere.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2013 Infiniti JX35.
lead_paragraph: The JX35 misses most of its marks. Its bland performance makes the Acura MDX and Lexus RX feel like sport sedans by comparison. And its undisciplined design is a riot of swoops and lines that go everywhere and nowhere.

headline.seo: Even With All Those Seats, the Driver Is Left Out
headline.main: Even With All Those Seats, the Driver Is Left Out
headline.print_headline: Even With All Those Seats, the Driver Is Left Out
